name: Rug Burn OG
description: Rug Burn OG took 3rd place for hybrids at the 2012 High Times Cannabis Cup. By crossing Ghost OG with Rare Dankness #1, Rare Dankness Seeds has created a pungent flavor mix of sour citrus and hints of diesel that sting the senses. Though listed as an indica-leaning hybrid, Rug Burn provides an uplifting effect that helped it make its way onto High Times’ list of “Earth’s Strongest Strains 2014.”
descriptionPlain: Rug Burn OG took 3rd place for hybrids at the 2012 High Times Cannabis Cup. By crossing Ghost OG with Rare Dankness #1, Rare Dankness Seeds has created a pungent flavor mix of sour citrus and hints of diesel that sting the senses. Though listed as an indica-leaning hybrid, Rug Burn provides an uplifting effect that helped it make its way onto High Times’ list of “Earth’s Strongest Strains 2014.”
aka: Rug Burn, Rug Burn OG Kush, Rug Burn Kush, Rugburn, Rugburn OG, Rugburn OG Kush

highlightedReviews.text:
Very sweet smelling and very sage like, compact buds and of course super dank hairs all over this bud it has a little of a curved structure hits my eyes and jaw immediately. Heavy tastes of lime! Not lemon lime for sure very tasty the sage is in here too, Its a nice uplifting strain that brings you back to a wonderful memory of being medicated and carefree, love the light body on this hybrid, I think what I  am find is that the ghost OG in this strain is strong! I got this for free since my order was messed up. This rare dankness strain is unusual too never heard of the dankness strain, rare darkness yes of course super sleep combo of grape ape and og kush. The effects for this are heavy uplifting concentration while taming your pain its great if your looking for something with  more psychedelic "lucy in the sky with diamonds" or a "D-D-D-D-D-DDDDDDROP THE BASS WAHWHA" ya feel me for you lovers of one word its great.
Recommend this for those looking for a nice vacation wwhen you simply can't afford it. ADHD, Migrains,Pain,PMS, depression and of course, Nausea! Happy trails~

One of the best strains I've had from Harvest of Scottsdale, stands head and shoulder above the rest and slams the senses in delight. Extremely aromatic (along the likes of Jack Herer or Grape Ape in terms of pungency) with dense, conical buds that are generously frosted. Bright orange hairs add visual texture throughout as well. The taste of the smoke upon exhale is enough to make the most experienced patients lean back with eyebrows raised, impressed frown and head nods all around. Tastes exactly as it smells- a true rarity. Smoking this flower leaves the user wonderfully relaxed and in a mellow mood, yet still allowing for creativity in the mind and the opportunity for an involved harmony with one's surroundings. Newer patients should caution the sedating effects of this strain despite its hybrid nature, and veteran smokers can enjoy that a little goes a long way for uplifting any situation.

articles.title: New Strains Alert: Sour Amnesia, Dawg's Waltz, Petrolia Headstash, Tangilope, and Rug Burn OG
articles.author: Bailey Rahn
articles.text:
It's Friday at last, so why not try some new strains this weekend? If you're feeling adventurous and looking for some new effects and flavors, we've got a few new varieties in the Leafly Explorer for you to try out. To our sativa-lovers, indica-lovers, and all of you in between, we're sure one of these newcomers will have what you're looking for.
Remember to nominate other new strains using the Leafly app, and don't forget to leave reviews for any of these newcomers if you've had the pleasure of trying them!
   1. Sour Amnesia
Characteristics of Sour Amnesia:

Mostly sativa strain
Cross between Sour Diesel and Amnesia
Breeder: HortiLab Seeds
Earthy, floral aroma with citrus and diesel undertones
Soaring, uplifting effects

   2. Dawg's Waltz
Characteristics of Dawg's Waltz:

Indica-dominant hybrid
Cross between Purple Urkle and Tres Dawg
Skunky grape aroma
Relaxing, couch-lock effects
May help with chronic pain and insomnia

   3. Petrolia Headstash
Characteristics of Petrolia Headstash:

Mostly indica strain
Descends from Afghani
Breeder: Reeferman Seeds
Pine, wood, and earthy aroma
Drowsy, relaxed effects
May help with cramps, pain, and stress

   4. Tangilope
Characteristics of Tangilope:

80/20 sativa-dominant strain
Cross between Tangie and Chocolope
Breeder: DNA Genetics
Chocolate, citrus aroma
Cerebral effects that evoke happiness, giggles, and creativity

   5. Rug Burn OG
Characteristics of Rug Burn OG:

Sativa-dominant hybrid
Cross between Ghost OG and Rare Dankness #1
Sour citrus and diesel aroma
Strong, uplifting effects
